lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: That was actually kind of Gnarly.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Next, I'll teach you how to do damage.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Klat Yeknom has many monkey goons.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Take this cookie gun and shoot those monkeys in that cave up ahead.

lines.speaker: Snorlax
lines.text: Those dudes are weird masochists, so don't worry about hurting them.
